title: Watch Hands-Free Technology Still Dangerously Distracting Drivers
text:
Watch: Hands-Free Technology Still Dangerously Distracting Drivers 
ABC News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Well there are today's tech bytes hands free technology behind the wheel and may not be as safe as we think. A new study says it takes 27 seconds for a driver using voice commands to regain full alertness. In that time people blew through stop signs had close calls and traveled the length of three football fields YouTube is hoping you'll pay ten bucks a month. To watch videos ad free and exclusive con Tet YouTube Brad launches next Wednesday with a free one month trial. And and Nike is going back to the future of creating a real life version of those self tying sneakers featured in part to....
